column8: 生命衰减至0时，精神力将难以支持仪器继续探测<Yellow:密境>，为保证战斗人员的安全，仪器会将你强制拉出战斗。
column9: When your HP drops to 0, your mind will struggle to continue investigating a <Yellow:Domain>. For your safety, you'll be evacuated.

column8: 本次情况紧急，我调整了仪器的功率，它将按照守密人体征健康且狂气充盈的功率进行输出。
column9: The situation is urgent! I've adjusted the device's power output to match your vitals, fully charging up our Aliemus!

column8: 这种做法极为凶险，但我们不得不放手一搏。现在，使用狂气爆发来终结这一战吧！
column9: As it is, we have but one recourse left... it might be dangerous, but we're out of options. Now, unleash my Exalt to end this battle!

column8: 别在这么重要的仪式上走神哦，<Yellow:守密人>，下一个就轮到你被授予银钥匙了。
column9: Stay focused, <Yellow:Keeper>. The ceremony isn't over yet. You're next in line for a Silver Key.

column8: 立下自己的墓碑，以此证明我们为<Yellow:对抗融蚀>献出生命的决意——这不仅是弥萨格的传统，也是我们结束预科学习、成为正式调查员的标志。
column9: Erect your tombstone, and devote your life to the fight against <Yellow:Dissolution>. This Mythag tradition marks your graduation as a student, and the beginning of your tenure as an Investigator.

column8: 准备好了的话，就在墓碑上镌刻下你的名字吧。
column9: Ready? Then engrave your name. Make it official.

column8: 欢迎你加入弥萨格大学，%player%。
column9: Welcome to Mythag University, %player%.

column8: 或者说……欢迎你，正式跨入世界的里侧。
column9: Or rather, welcome to the world beyond the veil.

column8: 我回来了。
column9: I'm home.

column8: 你的加入可以说是众望所归。不出两天，威廉就要给我们分配<Yellow:灾厄调查任务>了。
column9: Everyone's been waiting for you. In a couple of days, William will assign us our first <Yellow:Cataclysm Investigation Mission>.

column8: 他可不会饶过你这个百年一遇的守密人。
column9: He won't go easy on you, even if you're our once-in-a-century Keeper.

column8: 希望你的@1 外勤课题不像微积分课程一样依赖我这个<Blue:助手>。
column9: Just promise me you won't rely on your <Blue:assistant> for your @1 field work; at least not the same way you do for your Calculus course.

column8: 没想到会参加自己的葬礼。
column9: Never expected to attend my own funeral.

column8: 接纳死亡，让我们不再畏惧死亡。
column9: Embracing our mortality banishes the fear of death.

column8: 只要名字还镌刻在碑铭上，我们的存在就不会被@2抹去。
column9: As long as our tombstones stand, we're protected against @2's Dissolution.

column8: 温和的声音夹杂着扭曲的嘶鸣在脑海中回荡。
column9: Her gentle voice, interwoven with distorted screeches, echoes in your mind.

column8: 我将作为你的助手，陪你抵达这条道路的终点……<Yellow:愿银钥指引前路。>
column9: As your assistant, I'll be with you till the very end... <Yellow:May the Silver Key light your path.>

column8:
还好吗，%player%？
从刚才开始，你的脸色就不太对劲。需要我送你去医务室吗？
column9: Are you all right, %player%? You're looking a bit pale. Should we drop by the infirmary?

column8: 她清冽的声音让头脑清晰了些许，眩晕的感觉也逐渐消退。
column9: Her crisp voice clears your mind, and the dizziness fades away.

column8: 没事，只是一点头晕，已经缓解了。
column9: Don't worry, I was just a little dazed... but I'm feeling better already.

column8:
唔，保险起见，还是和我链接吧。
作为助手，也作为你的搭档，时刻确认你的状态可是我的责任。
column9: Is that so? Just to be safe, why not establish a link with me? As your assistant and partner, it's my responsibility to monitor your condition.

column8: 现在？就在这里？
column9: Right now? Out here?

column8: 稍微提前了一点点，不过没关系，不是吗？
column9: It's maybe a little earlier than planned, but it shouldn't matter, right?

column8: 从一年前开始，我就在期待今天了。
column9: Besides, I've been looking forward to this day for over a year now.

column8: 细雨将指尖濡湿，微弱的电流穿透手套，顺着你的皮肤和她的指尖隐秘流淌。
column9: Raindrops slip into your gloves, wetting your fingertips, while a faint current seeps through the material, flowing secretly between your skin and hers.

column8: 莫名的情绪顺着电流触动了你的神经，那是欣喜、雀跃、不安和……
column9: Inexplicable emotions surge through your nerves—joy, excitement, unease, and...

column8: ……<Yellow:希望>。
column9: ...<Yellow:hope>.

column8: 多么温暖……精神链接非常稳定，你的精神与生命力从未如今天一般强韧。
column9: How warm... the connection is perfect. Your spirit and life force have never shone brighter.

column8:
你可不能轻易倒下哦，<Yellow:世界唯一>的守密人。
我们还指望靠你来调查和记录所有被融蚀抹消的历史呢。
column9: You mustn't falter, <Yellow:the one and only> Keeper. We're counting on you to investigate and document all history lost to Dissolution.

column8: 眼底的担忧散去，拉蒙娜半开玩笑地在嘴角勾起一个令人安心的弧度。
column9: The worry in her eyes fades as Ramona offers a reassuring half-smile.

column8: 淅沥的雨声填满天地。
column9: The sound of drizzling rain fills the world.

column8: <Red:不安、疼痛、窒息>却在某滴雨珠落下时，填满了胸口。
column9: But as sudden as a raindrop, <Red:unease, pain, and suffocation> flood your chest.

column8: 拉蒙娜！
column9: Ramona!

column8: 钟声鸣响。
column9: The bell tolls.

column8:
谢谢你，守密人，你又救了我一次。
如果不是这链接，我现在大概命悬一线了。
column9: Thank you, Keeper. You've saved me once again. If not for the link we shared, I'd be in serious trouble right now.

column8: 现在可不是说这些的时候——
column9: Save that for later. Now is not the time!

column8:
交谈间，漆黑的异变已在你们身边蔓延。
惨叫声连绵不绝，昨天课堂上的同学不断化为漆黑黏液。
column9: The pitch-black anomaly spreads around you. Your classmates' screams echo in your ears, as they dissolve into black sludge one by one.

column8: 我已经通过链接向你共享了银钥监测到的敌方<Yellow:意图>，小心，它要发动攻击了！
column9: The Silver Key is communicating the enemy's <Yellow:intent> to us through our link. Watch out, it's about to attack!

column8:
保护好你手中的指令仪，小心融蚀污染。
在接下来的战斗中，它不可或缺。
column9: Protect your Command Device and beware of Dissolution! It will be essential in the upcoming battle!

column8: 按住<Yellow:指令卡>，拖动到<Yellow:中央指令区>，向我发出行动指令。
column9: Hold down a <Yellow:Command Card>, drag it upwards, then release it to command me in combat.

column8: 保持警惕，它要发动攻击了，这伤害对现在的我来说是致命的。
column9: Stay on your toes, the enemy's about to attack. That much damage could kill me!

column8: 相信你会做出理智的选择。这回合的行动，就选择<Yellow:「防御」>吧。
column9: I trust that you'll make the right decision. For this turn, I suggest playing the <Yellow:"Defense"> card.

column8: 拖延下去对我们不利，必须速战速决。
column9: We can't afford to stall for much longer. Let's end this in one fell swoop.

column8:
这是我自幼修习的<Yellow:「女王之剑」>。
就用这一击终结它吧！
column9: This is <Yellow:"Queen's Sword">, a technique I've practiced since childhood. May it strike down our foe!

column8:
感觉到我身上流转的狂气了吗，守密人？
多亏有你的精神力压制，否则它将会让我陷入和萝坦一样的疯狂。
column9: Do you sense the Aliemus coursing through me, Keeper? Without your guidance, I'd be as mad as Lotan.

column8: 不过现在，它能够为我们所用。
column9: However, we can now put it to good use.

column8: 看向狂气流转的方向……对，看向指令仪的<Blue:左上角>。
column9: Focus on the Aliemus current... yes, it should be on the <Blue:top left corner> of the Command Device.

column8:
释放狂气爆发，贯彻我的<Yellow:「世界演绎法」>吧！
在对抗融蚀的过程中，<Yellow:只有合理应对攻势，才能谋得最大的生机>。
column9: Unleash my Exalt and enact my <Yellow:"Mundus Decree">! In the fight against Dissolution, <Yellow:we must stay sharp to effectively counter the enemy>.

column8: 糟糕，萝坦将要释放<Yellow:狂气爆发>……只靠这些指令的话……
column9: Damn it, Lotan is about to unleash her own <Yellow:Exalt>... these Command Cards won't suffice...

column8: 银钥匙与你精神相连，你的强烈感悟，乃至回忆，都能让它震荡出别具一格的力量。
column9: The Silver Key is bound to your spirit; as such, your memories and insight uniquely shape its power.

column8: 快看指令仪的<Blue:左下角>！银钥之能已经充盈，<Yellow:钥令>已经就绪。
column9: Look toward the <Blue:bottom left corner> of the Command Device. The Silver Key is brimming with energy... you now have access to your <Yellow:Posse>!

column8: 握紧银钥匙，唱诵密文……释放<Yellow:钥令>，为我争取到更多的战术空间！
column9: Grip the Silver Key and chant the incantation... activate <Yellow:Posse>, and grant me more tactical space!

column8: 这是……萝坦引以为傲的的<Yellow:「桀骜之刃」>，会瞬间发起多段攻击！
column9: This is... Lotan's prided technique <Yellow:"Blade of Defiance">, capable of launching multiple attacks in an instant!

column8: 应对这一招……用<Yellow:「攻势推演」>避开关键弱点，这样更稳妥。
column9: To counter her move... employ my <Yellow:"Assault Thesis"> . Better safe than sorry.

column8: 看来你已经找到状态了。接下来指挥就交给你了，守密人！
column9: Looks like you've found your rhythm. The command is yours, Keeper!

column8: 喂，你这家伙，快点，让我释放<Yellow:「桀骜之刃」>。
column9: Hey you! Quit dawdling and use my <Yellow:"Blade of Defiance"> already.

column8:
慢着，守密人。
先释放「打击」，激发萝坦的血性，能够降低<Yellow:「桀骜之刃」>的算力消耗。
column9: If I may interject, Keeper. First, utilize the "Strike" Command Cards to reduce the Arithmetica Cost of <Yellow:"Blade of Defiance">.

column8:
合适的指令组合能让我们的攻击事半功倍。
战术就在指令中，守密人。好好想想。
column9: The right command sequence can optimize our effectiveness in battle. Every choice matters. Think tactically.

column8: 小心，对方进入强攻态势了！
column9: Watch out, the enemy is going on the offensive!

column8:
怕什么，我还在这里呢。
守密人，让我执行<Yellow:「外域手术」>。
column9: What's all that fuss about? I'm here with you. Keeper, let me perform <Yellow:"Outer Surgery">.

column8: 呼，抱歉，现在没时间等你适应了。
column9: Phew. Sorry, there's no time for you to acclimate to all of this properly.

column8: 异变体在警钟敲响之前抵达钥冢，弥萨格外围的<Blue:迷雾屏障>多半已经失效。
column9: These Mutants reached the Keygrave before the alarm sounded. The <Blue:Mist Barrier> around Mythag must be down.

column8:
<Blue:威廉>学长知道今天钥冢有仪式，但援兵一直没来，加上钟声……
我们必须想办法和他们会合，<Yellow:消灭异变的源头>。
column9: We informed <Blue:William> about today's ceremony, but no reinforcements came to our aid. The bell... we should regroup and <Yellow:eliminate the source of the anomaly>!

column8: 那是？！
column9: What is that?!

column8: 视线尽头，金发少年抬着与身量不相称的黑色巨盾，正在抵抗身姿矫健的双剑战士的攻击。
column9: In the periphery of your vision, a blond youth raises a massive black shield, barely fending off a dual-wielding swordswoman's assault.

column8: 他用护盾牢牢挡住身后的粉色长发少女，被逼得节节后退。
column9: He guards the pink-haired girl behind him, each deflected attack pushing him back another step.

column8: 等等……正在发动袭击的人……是<Yellow:唤醒体>萝坦？！
column9: Wait, the assailant... is that <Yellow:Awakener> Lotan?!

column8: 朵尔？<Blue:钟楼>失控了？！
column9: Doll? Is the <Blue:Clock Tower> compromised?!

column8: 拉蒙娜大惊失色，在记忆中，你似乎从未见过她如此慌乱的模样。
column9: Ramona looks terrified; you've never seen her this flustered.

column8: 被劈头盖脸砸了问题的少女声音颤抖，看上去有些疲惫。
column9: The girl, bombarded with questions, speaks in a trembling voice, her fatigue evident.

column8: 你认识她，她是以难交流著称的教授朵尔，隶属于<Blue:唤醒系科研所>。换句话说，是非战斗人员。
column9: You recognize her. Professor Doll of the <Blue:Awakening Research Institute>; infamously difficult, and a non-combatant.

column8: 不然我、来这里度假吗？
column9: Obviously. Did you think I came here for a leisurely stroll?

column8: 她闭了闭眼，振作起来。
column9: She closes her eyes, quickly recomposing herself.

column8: 钥冢居然也受到了袭击？这里离后门近，你们抓紧时间离开。
column9: The Keygrave is compromised as well? We're near the rear exit. You two should evacuate immediately.

column8: 我们能帮上忙！%player%可以链接我们所有人，然后指挥——
column9: We can help! %player% can establish a link with us and take command—

column8:
拉蒙娜。
那些是我们的义务，%player%只是个刚读完预科的新人。
column9: Ramona. This is our duty. %player% is merely a prep school graduate, still wet behind the ears.

column8: 但%player%已经和我链接了，我知道%heorshe%可以……我相信%heorshe%可以！
column9: %player% has already linked with me, and I know that {Male=he,Female=she}'s up to the task. I believe in {Male=him,Female=her}!

column8: 朵尔上下打量你，板起脸朝向拉蒙娜。
column9: Doll scrutinizes you, then turns to Ramona with a stern expression.

column8:
如果我没猜错，宣誓仪式应该尚未完成。
%heorshe%，还没有被授予银钥匙吧？
column9: If memory serves, the oath ceremony was interrupted. {Male=He,Female=She} hasn't received {Male=his,Female=her} Silver Key yet, correct?

column8: 接下来我们会深入弥萨格禁区，未经授权者擅入禁区是什么级别的事故，我以为你自幼在此长大，心里是有数的。
column9: We'll be delving into a <Bold:restricted> area. I'd expect someone raised at Mythag to understand what that means.

column8:
情况紧急，我们别无选择，不是吗？
而且，%player%不是普通的新生，%heorshe%是我们唯一的守密人。
column9: It's an emergency! We have no choice, right? Besides, %player% isn't just any freshman. {Male=He's,Female=She's} our only Keeper.

column8: 你应该还记得吧，一年前的<Yellow:阿库特大爆炸>。 当时如果不是%heorshe%以一己之力链接所有唤醒体，我现在也不可能站在这里与你争论。
column9: Don't you remember the <Yellow:Acushnet Explosion> a year ago? If not for {Male=him,Female=her} single-handedly linking all the Awakeners back then, I wouldn't be here having this discussion with you right now.

column8: 粉色头发的少女没有回答，反而转向了你。
column9: The pink-haired girl doesn't answer, and instead, she turns to you.

column8: 我知道你曾经窥见过<Yellow:「门」>内之物。但无论是世界的未来，还是弥萨格的内核，或许都比你想象得更为残酷。
column9: I know you caught a glimpse of what lies beyond the <Yellow:Gate>; but reality, be it Mythag's foundation or the fate of the world, may not be as you idealize.

column8: 我们面对的是会毁灭物质存在本身的现象，一旦被<Yellow:融蚀>污染，你的一切都会烟消云散。
column9: We're combating a phenomenon that unmakes existence itself. <Yellow:Dissolution> contamination doesn't kill or destroy. It erases.

column8: 你在宣誓仪式中刻在墓碑上的名字，也会化作一滩黑泥，无人铭记。
column9: Your tombstone inscription, your legacy, will be reduced to a sludge of nothingness, forgotten by all.

column8: 回答我，你真的做好觉悟了吗？
column9: Answer me. Are you truly ready for this?

column8: 朵尔冷冰冰地望着你，语调毫无起伏。
column9: Doll's icy gaze meets yours, her voice flat.

column8: 她看上去没什么表情，但你从那冰霜般的瞳孔底部，窥见了熊熊燃烧的火焰。
column9: Her face betrays nothing, but deep within her frosty pupils, you glimpse a blazing fire.

column8: 你的回答是——
column9: Your answer is—

column8: 我的墓碑，现在正伫立于钥冢之中。
column9: My tombstone now stands as a part of the Keygrave.

column8:
你是弥萨格的一员。
或许早在阿库特时，你就已经是了。
column9: You're a member of Mythag. Perhaps you already were back in Acushnet.

column8: 这里有只有我能做到的事情。
column9: There are things only I can accomplish.

column8: 这决定或许稍显仓促，但谁能保证人生的每个时刻都是准备万全的呢？
column9: The decision may be hasty, but can one ever be truly prepared for everything in life?

column8: 好。
column9: Very well.

column8: 我代弥萨格第六任校长<Blue:奥利弗·艾尔西>授予你这枚银钥匙，编号K-0617。
column9: By the authority of Mythag's 6th Headmaster, <Blue:Oliver Elsie>, I hereby confer Silver Key K-0617 upon you.

column8:
朵尔从精密的小盒中取出银钥匙，佩戴在你的胸口。
银钥匙闪过荧光，熟悉的感觉充盈胸腔。
column9: Doll retrieves the Silver Key from an ornate case, placing it on your chest. It glows faintly, flooding you with a vague sense of familiarity.

column8: 从今往后，你将以守密人的称号，与万万千千的弥萨格师生同在。
column9: Henceforth, you stand as a Keeper among the myriad of Mythag's students and scholars.

column8: 现在，和我链接吧。
column9: Now then, establish a link with me.

column8:
你依照训练谨慎地发动银钥匙。
银辉闪烁，精神链接如千缕无形丝线将你和朵尔的感官联系起来。
column9: You follow your training and cautiously activate the Silver Key. Silver light flickers as invisible threads tether your senses to Doll's.

column8:
仿佛电流接通，“啪”地一声，无数光影讯息传入脑海。
你被强烈的心悸震慑，几乎站立不稳。
column9: Countless images surge through the connection, electric and overwhelming. Your heart pounds violently as you struggle to stay upright.

column8: 朵尔，你……
column9: Doll, you...

column8:
你来得很及时，守密人。
我和奥吉尔……都已经是强弩之末了。
column9: Your timing is adequate, Keeper. Ogier and I... we were at our wits' end.

column8: 你留在原地休息，我和拉蒙娜参战支援奥吉尔。
column9: Stay here and rest. Ramona and I will join the battle and support Ogier.

column8: 冷静。就算你的精神能够承受，拉蒙娜的伤势也不适合立即投入战斗。
column9: Composure, please. You cannot compensate for Ramona's injuries with foolhardiness. She's currently not fit for combat.

column8: 那孩子还能坚持一会儿，先跟我来。
column9: That kid, Ogier, can hold on a little longer. Follow me first.

column8: 小心，别靠近！我的盾要撑不住了！
column9: Stay back! Please... my shield beginning to falter!

column8: 只听“咣”地一声，萝坦的双剑再次击碎了黑色粘液凝固成的巨盾。
column9: With a clang, Lotan's twin swords shatter the black sludge shield once again.

column8: 不够看不够看！掀起狂浪吧！给我一场酣畅淋漓的战斗吧！
column9: Pathetic! Utterly pathetic! Battling this weakling won't satisfy me! Give me a real fight!

column8: 名为萝坦的唤醒体挥舞着双刀，一次又一次地袭向奥吉尔，那威力昭示着无情的现实——她已经彻底失控了。
column9: The Awakener Lotan swings her twin blades, relentlessly assaulting Ogier. The sheer power behind each strike makes it clear... she has lost control.

column8: 看这情形，我们只能……
column9: Given the situation, we must...

column8: 拉蒙娜，帮我压制萝坦！
column9: Ramona, help me subdue Lotan!

column8: 你不会是要……
column9: You can't possibly mean to...

column8: 我去链接她！
column9: I'll establish a link with her!

column8: 别开玩笑了，唤醒体的失控会通过链接与调查员高频共振，即使是你也——
column9: Don't be foolish! An Awakener's breakdown resonates through the link! Even you—

column8: 除了我没人能做到这点，你知道的。
column9: You know that I'm the only one who can do this.

column8: 夸我的时候“百年一遇”，真面临危机了就把我当花瓶，这不太合适。
column9: You call me a <Italic:once-in-a-century prodigy>, but the moment a crisis strikes... I'm suddenly treated as if I'm made of porcelain. You can't have it both ways.

column8: 有些风险总得面对。
column9: Some risks can't be avoided.

column8: 我们别无他法。这里失控的人太多了，不反抗的话，只会被疯狂吞没。
column9: We have no choice. With so many losing control, either we fight the ones stricken with madness or get consumed by it.

column8:
况且，就凭你我二人，根本不可能突破钟楼那边的包围。
我们需要帮助，需要支配唤醒体的力量。
column9: Besides, we can't possibly breach the Clock Tower's siege by ourselves. We'll need all the help we can get... we must find a way to command the Awakeners.

column8: 拉蒙娜，支援我。
column9: Ramona, I need your support.

column8: 既然你执意如此……作为“搭档”，我也没有更多阻止你的理由。
column9: Since you've made up your mind... as your partner, I won't try to stop you.

column8: 拉蒙娜，随时应战！
column9: Ramona, ready for battle!

column8: 发动银钥匙，%player%。
column9: Activate the Silver Key, %player%.

column8: 银钥匙闪烁，一阵虚幻的景象突然浮现，并渐渐和眼前的现实重合。
column9: The Silver Key flickers. An illusory scene coalesces into existence, overlapping with reality before your very eyes.

column8: 眩晕感让思维变得生涩，脑内似有警笛尖鸣，朵尔的声音也开始变得渺远起来……
column9: Feeling dazed, your thoughts slow to a crawl. A siren wails inside your skull. Doll's voice fades into the distance...

column8: 你竭力镇定心神，从嘈杂琐碎的乱语中分辨朵尔提供的信息。
column9: You fight to steady your thoughts, trying your hardest to focus on Doll's words despite the noise ringing in your mind.

column8: 看见了吗？你眼前的就是密境——一个由<Yellow:幻梦维度>和<Yellow:现实维度>共同构成的特殊区域。
column9: Can you perceive it? Before you is what we call a Domain. An amalgam of <Yellow:Dream> and <Yellow:Reality>.

column8: 弥萨格在密境中投射了一部分<Blue:联络点>，以稳定调查员趋于疯狂的心智，为唤醒体弥合伤口。
column9: Mythag has projected <Blue:Junctions> to stabilize the Investigators' fraying minds and tend to the Awakeners' wounds.

column8: 然而，人为干预在密境里效果有限，我们无法保证<Blue:联络点>出现的位置，一切还要依靠你的随机应变。
column9: However, human influence falters within a Domain. We cannot be sure where those <Blue:Junctions> are located. It's adapt or perish.

column8: 现在，就去最近的<Blue:联络点>，帮拉蒙娜治愈伤口吧。
column9: Now, head to the nearest <Blue:Junction> so that you may heal Ramona's wounds.

column8: <Yellow:银芯>？没想到在这里……
column9: <Yellow:Silver>? Didn't expect to find any here...

column8:
制造银钥匙，链接唤醒体，提供精神能源……
弥萨格的一切活动都与<Yellow:银芯>息息相关。
column9: Whether it's crafting Silver Keys, linking Awakeners, or providing spiritual energy... it all depends on <Yellow:Silver>.

column8:
哪怕是极微量的<Yellow:银芯>，对弥萨格的研究也有着超乎寻常的价值。
尽量把它们都收集起来吧。
column9: Even trace amounts of <Yellow:Silver> hold extraordinary value for Mythag's research. Gather as much as you can.

column8: 你们阻拦不了我！……无耻的人类……
column9: You can't stop me! Shameless humans...

column8: 你触摸着刚刚获得的银钥匙，微弱的震动传来，催促你完成与萝坦的共鸣。
column9: Your fingers brush the Silver Key. It thrums faintly, urging you to resonate with Lotan.

column8: <Shake:早知如此……绝不与你们定下约定……>
column9: <Shake:Had I known... I'd never have made a pact with you...>

column8: 拉蒙娜走近萝坦，向她伸出手。
column9: Ramona approaches Lotan, holding out her hand.

column8: 我知道，当年你被唤醒时，弥萨格曾许诺你，会与你一起战斗……战斗至这个星球的末日。
column9: I know that after your awakening, Mythag promised to fight alongside you. To fight together till the planet's end.

column8: 我们从未打算过违背约定，这个三百年，下一个三百年，我们都将为此负重前行。
column9: We never intended to break our promise. Not for three hundred years, nor the next three hundred to come.

column8: 萝坦，你期待的酣畅淋漓的战斗，近在眼前。
column9: Lotan, the fierce battle you crave is within your grasp.

column8: 呵，就凭你们，也想毁灭这颗星球？
column9: Hmph, you think you have what it takes to destroy this planet?

column8: 还远远不够！无论还有多少，统统放马过来吧！
column9: Far from enough! Bring it on! Fight me with everything you've got!

column8: 现在，我和奥吉尔也出战。
column9: Ogier and I are joining the battle.

column8: 我能通过链接感受到，你和奥吉尔的状况还不足以……
column9: I can sense through the link that neither of you are in good condition.

column8:
没关系的，守密人。
骑士就是为了守护大家而存在的，奥吉尔可以撑住！
column9: It's okay, Keeper. It's a knight's duty to protect others. I can still hold on!

column8: 不必担心，现在有你来稳定心神，我们不会失控，可以最大限度地利用狂气。
column9: Worry not. With your assistance, we won't lose control and can make the most of our Aliemus.

column8: 只要积攒足够的狂气，我就能恢复状态。
column9: Once I've accumulated enough Aliemus, I'll be able to fully recuperate my strength.

column8:
别再犹豫了，守密人。
接下来能否突破围堵，就看你的指挥了。
column9: Your hesitation is misplaced, Keeper. We are counting on you to break through the blockade.

column8: 就让我来见证一下吧——弥萨格的未来，究竟寄托在了怎样的指挥上。
column9: Let me witness for myself the worth of this prodigy Mythag stakes its future upon!

column8: 你们穿过钟楼下的小门，进入一处隐蔽的封闭通道。
column9: You slip through the hidden door beneath the Clock Tower, stepping into a concealed passage.

column8: 朵尔在前方引路，脚步敲击在金属路面，发出空洞的回响。
column9: Doll marches forward, her boots clanging against the metal walkway with each step.

column8: 我还是第一次知道，钟楼下还有这样的密道……
column9: A secret passage below the clock tower? I had never heard of it before...

column8:
尽人皆知的，我猜就不叫密道了。
通道连接的是<Yellow:黑池>，那是弥萨格的立身之本。
column9: If it was common knowledge, it would hardly qualify as a <Bold:secret> passage. This tunnel leads to the <Yellow:Black Pool>... Mythag's foundation.

column8: 如果没有黑池底的被称为<Yellow:核>的<Yellow:巨型银芯>，仅靠孱弱的人类精神来维持唤醒体现世，弥萨格的唤醒体技术不知道要比现在落后几十年。
column9: Without that giant Silver artifact known as the <Yellow:Core> at the bottom of the Black Pool, our Awakener technology would regress decades. Human spirits alone are too fragile to sustain them.

column8: 所以不允许未链接唤醒体离开弥萨格，也是担心我们会陷入疯狂吗？
column9: So the restriction on unlinked Awakeners... it's to protect us from succumbing to madness?

column8:
那倒不完全是。
如果每个唤醒体都像你一样省心就好了，奥吉尔。
column9: That's not entirely true. If all Awakeners were as manageable as you, Ogier, my job would be far simpler.

column8: 好了，我们到了。
column9: Alright, we've arrived.

column8:
说着，朵尔按下了通道侧面一个不显眼的按钮。
叮的一声，门洞敞开，你们迈入光线幽暗的狭小空间。
column9: As she speaks, Doll presses an inconspicuous button on the wall. A sharp ding rings out as the doorway slides open, revealing cramped and dimly lit chamber beyond.

column8: 大门缓缓开启，禁忌之所的景象初次展现在你们眼前。
column9: The great gate slowly parts, offering your first glimpse into the forbidden sanctum.

column8: 祂的下身浸于黑色的泥沼中，那吞噬一切的黑暗衬得祂更加光耀夺目，洁白无瑕。
column9: Their luminous upper body floats above the black mire, the inky darkness serving only to accentuate Their blinding purity.

column8: 恍惚间，你眼前非人的身影，与你在钥冢中出神时看到的年轻女性的轮廓悄然重合。
column9: Mesmerized, you gaze upon the inhuman entity, Their outline briefly superimposing with that of the young woman you saw while in a trance back at the Keygrave.

column8: 祂没有面孔，你却从祂伫立的身姿中读出了某种悲悯。
column9: They have no face, yet Their stance radiates profound compassion.

column8: 至高、至洁、至善、至美。
column9: The Almighty. The Purest. The Noblest. The Fairest.

column8: <Shake:你……来了……>
column9: <Shake:You... are here...>

column8: 白色的怪物发出喑哑的声音，似是嘶吼，又似是悲鸣。
column9: The pale monster emits a hoarse cry, roar and wail entwined.

column8: 那绝非人类的语言，你却理解了祂话语中的含义。
column9: It's not human speech, yet you comprehend its meaning perfectly.

column8: 眼前的一切突然变得模糊，你眨了眨眼睛，温热的液体从你脸颊滑过。
column9: Your vision blurs and your eyes sting unexpectedly. Warm rivulets trace down your cheeks.

column8: 那是泪水吗？可是为什么？是什么让你感到胸口发紧，眼眶酸涩？
column9: Are these tears? You're at a loss. What is this ache constricting your chest?

column8: ……<Yellow:塔薇>？
column9: ...<Yellow:Tawil>?

column8: 朵尔口中喃喃出的字句让拉蒙娜神色一变。
column9: The name muttered by Doll causes Ramona's expression to shift.

column8: 塔薇？是创始人之一的那个，唤醒体塔薇吗？
column9: Tawil? The Awakener Tawil, one of the founders?

column8:
你也记得。
在<Blue:《弥萨格校史》>中，这个名字和另外两个名字是一同出现的。
column9: You remember it too. <Blue:The History of Mythag> lists this name alongside two others.

column8: 洪积90年，<Blue:华德·菲利普斯>，<Blue:刻拉尔克什>和<Blue:塔薇>成立了<Blue:弥萨格学院（Mythag College）>。
column9: Year 90 After Flood, <Blue:Ward Philips>, <Blue:Khlarcus>, and <Blue:Tawil> founded <Blue:Mythag College>.

column8: 那正是你现在所在的，<Blue:弥萨格大学（Mythag University）>的前身。
column9: Where you stand now. The predecessor to current day <Blue:Mythag University>.

column8: 守密人。
column9: Keeper.

column8: 我在。
column9: I'm here.

column8: 你现在能站在这里，而不是被塔薇驱逐出去，就说明你的命运已经与弥萨格的未来紧紧相连了。
column9: The fact that Tawil has not expelled you yet... it can only mean that your fate is now linked to Mythag's.

column8: 所以，你有资格听我接下来说的信息。
column9: Therefore, you've earned the right to hear this.

column8:
这是弥萨格大学隐藏最深的秘密。
塔薇——这位弥萨格大学创始人——既非人类，也不是唤醒体。
column9: This is the deepest secret of Mythag University. Tawil, one of our three founders, is neither human nor Awakener.

column8: 祂是来自其他维度的生物，最初出现时，只是初代校长菲利普斯聆听到的一缕絮语。
column9: They're an extradimensional entity initially perceived as mere whispers by Phillips, the first Headmaster.

column8: 与“塔薇是唤醒体”这个认知恰好相反，提炼银芯、<Yellow:唤醒与上位意志共鸣的亡者>的唤醒体技术，是在塔薇的引导下诞生的。
column9: Contrary to popular belief, Tawil isn't an Awakener. Silver refinement and <Yellow:postmortem Awakening of individuals resonant with the Higher Will> were developed under Their guidance.

column8: 塔薇预言了融蚀的降临和世界毁灭的未来，传递了最初的「真理」，并在弥萨格学院建立后陷入沉睡。
column9: They foretold the impending Dissolution, shared the first "Truth," then fell dormant after establishing Mythag College.

column8: 根据菲利普斯先生的记载，这是塔薇为了避免「受到注视」，而选择的一种「非存在的」存在方式。
column9: Phillips' records suggest that Tawil opted for this "Nonexistent" state to evade observation.

column8: 只有当「变数」出现，祂才会以「苏醒」的方式「重生」——
column9: Only when the "Variable" emerges will They awaken—

column8: 快看！
column9: Look!

column8: 仿佛预兆着某种禁忌与灾厄的降临，「塔薇」发出一声刺破耳膜的尖啸。
column9: As if heralding disaster, "Tawil" let out a eardrum-piercing shriek.

column8: 伴随雏鸟破壳般的颤抖，六扇银色巨型羽翼自祂的身躯向两侧伸展开来。
column9: With the trembling of a hatchling breaking out from its shell, six magnificent silver wings burst forth from Their body.

column8: 羽翼的末梢不断滴落银色的液滴，淅淅沥沥地落入黑色的池水。
column9: Silver-like liquid drips steadily from each wingtip, creating a soft percussion as it hits the Black Pool below.

column8: 银色液体融入黑池的瞬间，池中波纹激荡，漆黑扭曲的融蚀体纷纷涌出。
column9: As the glinting substance meets the pitch-black of the pool, it churns violently. From its depths, grotesque Dissolutes emerge.

column8: 畸形的怪物无视物理规律冲出黑池，有些向你们扑来，有些向钟楼外的广场而去。
column9: The incomprehensible abominations scatter; some charging at your group, while the rest spill toward the Clock Tower plaza.

column8: <Shake:终于……找到……你……了……>
column9: <Shake:I have... finally... found... you...>

column8: 阻止祂！只有让祂停下，才能切断怪物的源头！
column9: We must stop Them! It's the only way to prevent more of those monsters from coming out!
Is it... over...?

column8: 「塔薇」仍静立原地，只是姿态已不似之前从容。
column9: "Tawil" remains standing in place, though no longer with the same composure.

column8: 在其他所有人反应过来之前，祂猛然张开银色的羽翼，向拉蒙娜扑去。
column9: Before anyone has a chance to react, They unfurl their wings, and lunge at Ramona.

column8: 时间像是凝固了
column9: Time comes to a halt.

column8: 你爆发出能够达到的最快速度，勉强挡在了拉蒙娜的面前。
column9: You move at full speed, barely intercepting in time.

column8: 白色的怪物直视着你。
column9: The pale monster stares at you.

column8: 用它那没有面孔的苍白身躯，静静地凝视着你。
column9: Faceless. Silent.

column8: 在你面前出现的，是神情淡漠的女性面庞。
column9: A woman's face comes into view, cold and expressionless.

column8: 她伸出手来，轻轻点了点你胸口的银钥匙。
column9: Her finger daintily taps your Silver Key.

column8: 银钥匙闪过回应的微光。
column9: It gleams as it's touched.

column8: 你就是变数，是原初也是终末的答案。
column9: You are the Variable, the answer to both the beginning and the end.

column8: 但愿你，是一切的转机……
column9: Hopefully, you will become the turning point...

column8: 洁白的六翼怪物，神情淡漠的女性，四散奔袭的淤泥魔物，扭曲啸叫的唤醒体黑影……
column9: The pale six-winged monster. The mud creatures. The twisted Awakeners...

column8: 全都化成了一滩黑水，随后消失不见。
column9: One by one, they melt into the Black Pool before vanishing completely. While the woman with a vacant expression floats upward.

column8: 不顾拉蒙娜和朵尔的呼喊，你握着银钥匙眺望高处，眺望向「塔薇」退回的「门」之内。
column9: Deaf to Ramona and Dolls' calls, you clutch the Silver Key and stare up at "Tawil," already being engulfed by the "Gate" above.

column8:
你清晰地记得刚才看到的面容。
无论是淡漠的神色，眉眼的轮廓，还是嘴唇的弧度，都与拉蒙娜——
column9: You know that face. The indifference. The brows. The lips. All mirror Ramona's appearance.

column8: ——一模一样。
column9: They look exactly the same.

column8:
两天后

钥冢
column9:
Two Days Later

Keygrave

column8: ……弥萨格大学是对抗融蚀的先行者，是守望人类未来的重要防线。
column9: ...Mythag University are pioneers in the battle against Dissolution. We stand as humanity's last line of defense.

column8: 三百年来，弥萨格大学为解决融蚀，在暗中守护人类的平静生活，付出了沉重的代价。
column9: For three centuries we've been the bulwark secretly protecting our civilization's future. The cost... has been severe.

column8: 这片墓园，是我们提前准备的归宿，也是弥萨格师生为人类存续献出生命的觉悟。
column9: These graves were dug in advance. We honor all Mythag personnel, professors and students alike, who chose martyrdom over retreat.

column8: 演说还在继续，诃勒特合眼，叹了口气，呵出的白色水雾消散在雨丝中。
column9: The speech continues. Czort closes her eyes and sighs, her breath a white mist dissipating in the rain.

column8: ……我想，在众多届新生中，没有谁比你们更能体会这段话的沉重。
column9: ...I believe you understand the gravity of these words better than any other initiate.

column8: 这三百年间，黑池中曾经几度浮起过银芯、融蚀异变体等异常存在，但这种级别的异变，还是第一次发生。
column9: Over the centuries, The Black Pool has birthed Silver Cores and Mutants many times before... but this latest incident dwarfs them all.

column8: 有很多人再也没能回来。
column9: Too many never came home.

column8: 说话的人是弥萨格生命科学院代理院长诃勒特，传说中她能够看见异种生物，是前任院长最钟爱的学生。
column9: Ms. Czort is the Acting Dean of Mythag's Department of Biological Studies. Seer of otherworldly beings. The former dean's star pupil.

column8: 与融蚀相关的事件总是伴随着意外、疯狂和死亡，这就是我们这条道路上必然的经历。
column9: Dissolution brings only chaos, madness, and death. This is an inevitable burden we must bear together.

column8:
你理解诃勒特话语中的含义。
你前方的墓碑下空无一人。
column9: You understand the meaning behind Czort's words. There is no one buried in the grave before you.

column8: 墓碑之上，黑色的黏液缓缓流淌。
column9: Black slime oozes slowly across the tombstone.

column8: 仪式结束后，德克斯特勋爵将你邀请到了他的办公室。
column9: After the ceremony, Lord Dexter invites you to his office.

column8:
“德克斯特”这个名字你很熟悉，这是拉蒙娜的姓氏。
这位“德克斯特勋爵”是你的教授，也是拉蒙娜的养父。
column9: "Dexter" rings a familiar bell; it's Ramona's surname. He's your professor and her adoptive father.

column8: 我在报告中看到了这部分内容，有件事需要拜托你。
column9: About this section in your report... I have a favor to ask of you.

column8: 关于“塔薇”的容貌……能否请你对拉蒙娜保密？
column9: Regarding Tawil's appearance... could you keep that from Ramona for now?

column8: 为什么？
column9: Why?

column8: 怎么说呢……背后的因果相当复杂，一时半刻有点难以表述。
column9: How should I put it... The causality involved is quite complicated. Not something I can sum up quickly.

column8: 不过，我迟早会让她知道的，只是不是现在。
column9: But I will tell her eventually; just not yet.

column8: 这并非弥萨格保密需求考虑，而是一位希望保护女儿的父亲的请求。
column9: This is unrelated to Mythag's confidentiality protocols, but rather a request from a father who wishes to protect his daughter.

column8: 拜托，给我们一点时间，可以吗？
column9: Please, give me some time, alright?

column8: 虽然你希望知道真相，但还是点头答应。
column9: You nod in agreement, truth-hungry but compliant.

column8:
感谢你的理解。
说起来，最近正好有一批御用调和威士忌送到，我央人偷偷留了两瓶。
column9: Thank you for understanding. Speaking of which... I just got my hands on a couple of bottles of royal blend whiskey.

column8: 拿去吧，叫上拉蒙娜一起，品尝一下大人的味道——就当是你的专属迎新仪式，怎么样？
column9: Here, take one. Invite Ramona for a drink, and savor the taste of adulthood. Consider it your special initiation rite, eh?

column8:
只怕不合适吧，德克斯特勋爵。
融蚀可不会在我们休息的时候停止扩散。
column9: Respectfully, Lord Dexter, rest is a luxury we can't afford. The Dissolution won't pause for our convenience.

column8:
哎呀，威廉还是找到这里来了。
那我可救不了你了，小家伙。
column9: Alas, William has found his way here. Sorry kid, you're on your own now.

column8: 卷宗已经整理完毕，可以准备出勤了，新晋守密人。
column9: Your dossier is prepared. The time has come, our new Keeper. Report for duty.

column8: 愿银钥指引前路。
column9: May the Silver Key light your path.
